participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jake enjoys trying new things and is always looking for ways to expand his skills.
participant_1.background: I am a stunt double as my second job. I was raised in a single parent household. I only eat kosher. I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Passionate and driven, Maya is dedicated to her craft and loves to inspire others with her creativity.
participant_2.background: I produce music for artists. My pet's name is Charlie. My favourite food is pizza. I listen to rap music. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I produce music for artists.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in music production.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I love being able to create something from nothing.
That's awesome. I can't even imagine how you do it.
It's a lot of practice and trial and error. But once you get the hang of it, it's really fun.
I'm sure it is. I'm definitely going to have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What kind of music do you produce?
I produce all sorts of music, but I mostly focus on hip-hop and R&B.
Oh, that's cool. I like hip-hop.
Yeah, it's a great genre. There's so much variety in it.
That's true. I like how you can be creative with it and make something different from everyone else.
Yeah, that's what I love about it.
So, how did you get started in music production?
I started out playing guitar when I was a kid. I always loved music, and I wanted to find a way to make it my own.
That's cool. What kind of music did you play?
I played mostly rock and blues. I loved the way the guitar could make me feel.
I can imagine. Guitar is a great instrument.
Yeah, it's one of my favorites.
So, what made you want to start producing music?
I wanted to be able to create my own songs. I didn't want to be limited to playing other people's music.
That makes sense. I can imagine that would be really frustrating.
Yeah, it was. But it was also really motivating. I wanted to show people what I could do.
And you've been successful!
Thanks! I'm still learning, but I'm happy with where I'm at.
I'm sure you're going to go far.
Thanks for the encouragement!
